name: ashleighmac
description: A professional Australian voiceover artist known as the voice of The voices Australia website with 30 years experience. (Yes we know he does not look that old!) Have a listen to the demo and see some past work at voices and be assured of fast turnaround and accuracy.

name: hannahseidel
description:
(EN) I'm Hannah and I've been doing professional voice overs for seven years. From Youtube Pre-Roll Ads to TVCs, explanatory videos and documentaries, I love to share my voice in all kinds of different projects! My voice is clear, warm and empathic.
Looking forward to your inquiry!        //   
(DE) Seit 2014 setze ich verschiedenste Voice Over für Kunden um. Vom TV-Spot über Erklärfilme bis hin zu Radio Jingles. Meine Stimme ist warm und weich, empathisch und auch gut für weniger werbliche und lockerere Projekte geeignet. 
Meldet euch gern bei mir mit eurem Projekt, ich freu' mich drauf!
education: B.Sc. - multimedia design; fachhochschule, Germany, Graduated 2016;

name: muhammadusama_
description:
Hi there! My name is Muhammad Usama. I am Electrical Engineer but I am also a certified Graphic Designer with 3 years of professional experience and now I'm offering my services to you on Fiverr.  

I have done many projects of animating simple 2d gifs and designing HTML5 banner ads. And am professional in both these fields.

Customer satisfaction is my first priority, I will not quit until you are 100% satisfied.

Feel free to contact me, I'm always here for you.

Regards!
Usama.
education: B.Sc. - electrical engineering; university of engineering & technology, taxila, Pakistan, Graduated 2021;

description:
Hi, I'm Timothy Scott from the Netherlands. 
I am a motion designer with 10 years of professional experience. I have worked for large and small companies.
